step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and fingers open as you prepare to move.
Focus on stretching your arms fully overhead. Ensure your fingers are spread wide.
Great job squeezing your shoulder blades together as you make a fist and push down. Remember to inhale.
Excellent! Fully extend your arms overhead while exhaling and relaxing. Keep the movement smooth.
You're doing well. Ensure you are fully extending your arms overhead and relaxing your shoulders.
Good job on the second rep! Remember to keep your fingers open and stretch your arms up.
Continue to focus on a full stretch overhead. Make sure your fingers are spread wide.
Nicely done squeezing your shoulder blades together. Keep that form consistent and remember to inhale.
Excellent extension overhead on the exhale. Try to make the relaxation phase smooth and controlled.
You've completed the exercise! Ensure your arms are fully extended overhead and shoulders are relaxed.

exercise_summary: Great job completing the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open and stretch your arms fully overhead. Squeeze your shoulder blades together as you push down, and relax fully as you extend back up. Keep up the good work!
